mapper.insert: insert into class values (#{class_seq}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{title}, #{price}, #{zipcode}, #{address1},#{address2}, #{class_date}, #{creater_id}, #{creater_info}, default, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select class.*,nickname,profile_img from class join member on (creater_id = email) where class_seq=#{class_seq}

select count(*) from class
where category1=#{category1}

select count(*) from class where title like '%'||#{searchContents}||'%'
and category1=#{category1}
mapper.update: update class set like_count=like_count+1 where class_seq=#{class_seq}
update class set like_count=like_count-1 where class_seq=#{class_seq}
update class set star_count=${star_count} where class_seq=#{class_seq}
update class set state=1 where class_seq=#{class_seq}
